audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

name: MCBullsEye
short_description:
MCBullsEye is a Minecraft game plugin allowing you to create Bow and Arrow courses for competitions.  Each player plays on their own course.  Multiple games with multiple courses can be created.

Create multi-player courses and compete head-to-head to blow-up your targets first.  Use any block as a target. When the block is hit it explodes. 

This is the first beta. I believe most functionality is working properly, but I've only tested it on my machine. Any feedback is appreciated. 

Known issues: Directional blocks may not stay facing the direction they were placed after the game is reset. 

Future functionality: Disappearing target blocks.
summary: Bow and Arrow BullsEye game plugin for Minecraft Bukkit servers
